name: $$$ Royal - Mashup (388)

wave_0_per_point1=FLen = reg00;
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=n = int(sample*FLen);
wave_0_per_point4=vol = (value1+value2) * (1+ .1 / (sample+.03));
wave_0_per_point5=
wave_0_per_point6=chg = min(max(vol- gmegabuf(n),-1),1);
wave_0_per_point7=dec = if (chg>0, 1-chg*0.3, 1+chg*0.2);
wave_0_per_point8=
wave_0_per_point9=chg = q1 -q2;
wave_0_per_point10=dec = .94 - abs(chg) * if (chg> 0, .2,.1);
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=dec = min(max(dec,0),1);
wave_0_per_point13=gmegabuf(n) = gmegabuf(n)*dec + vol*(1-dec);
wave_0_per_point14=
wave_0_per_point15=dec = q2/4;
wave_0_per_point16=//dec = .90;
wave_0_per_point17=dec = max(min(dec,1),.1);
wave_0_per_point18=
wave_0_per_point19=gmegabuf(n) = gmegabuf(n)*dec + gmegabuf(n+(q2<.8))*(1-dec);
wave_0_per_point20=gmegabuf(n+10000) = gmegabuf(n+10000)*.2 + .8* vol/3;
wave_0_per_point21=a = .0;
wave_0_per_point22=x = sample;
wave_0_per_point23=y = .2 + gmegabuf(n+0)*.23;
wavecode_1_enabled=0

shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=0.93550
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000

shapecode_1_g2=0.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.200
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=0.000
shapecode_1_border_b=0.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=n = (instance);
shape_1_per_frame2=FLen = reg00;
shape_1_per_frame3=SLen = reg00/2;
shape_1_per_frame4=
shape_1_per_frame5=z0 = 10;
shape_1_per_frame6=y0 = gmegabuf(2000+n+FLen)/z0;
shape_1_per_frame7=x0 = gmegabuf(2000+n)/z0;
shape_1_per_frame8=
shape_1_per_frame9=a0 = (gmegabuf(n+10000));
shape_1_per_frame10=
shape_1_per_frame11=k1 = instance/num_inst-.5;
shape_1_per_frame12=x = .5 + x0 + sin(k1*8*sin(q12*.07)) * sin(q11*.13)*q3*.7; 
shape_1_per_frame13=y = .5 + q32*(y0 + sin(k1*8*sin(q14*.1)) * sin(q13*.2)*q3*.7); 
shape_1_per_frame14=
shape_1_per_frame15=arg = q2/8;
shape_1_per_frame16=high = exp(-500*pow(arg+.5-instance/num_inst,2));
shape_1_per_frame17=high += exp(-500*pow(-arg+.5-instance/num_inst,2));
shape_1_per_frame18=
shape_1_per_frame19=exc = sqrt((pow(x-.5,2)+pow(y-.5,2)));
shape_1_per_frame20=rad0 = above(z0,0)*min (.1, a0/60)+.005;
shape_1_per_frame21=rad0 = rad0 * (1+2*exc) * (1+high);
shape_1_per_frame22=
shape_1_per_frame23=p1 = .5 + sin(q12)/2;
shape_1_per_frame24=p2 = .5 + sin(q13*1.4)/2;
shape_1_per_frame25=//p1 = rand(1)-.5;
shape_1_per_frame26=//p2 = rand(1)-.5;
shape_1_per_frame27=exc = ((pow(x-p1,2)+pow(y-p2,2)));
shape_1_per_frame28=rad = min(rad0 * (1 + .004*q3/abs(exc)),1) ;
shape_1_per_frame29=
shape_1_per_frame30=a = min(a0*8+.4,1);
shape_1_per_frame31=
shape_1_per_frame32=k1 = instance/num_inst*5 + high;
shape_1_per_frame33=w = 1-exp(-treb_att/2-.5);
shape_1_per_frame34=g = w + (1-w)*sin(k1);
shape_1_per_frame35=r = w + (1-w)*sin(k1-6.28/3);
shape_1_per_frame36=b = w + (1-w)*sin(k1-6.28*2/3);
shape_1_per_frame37=
shape_1_per_frame38=a2 = a/4;
shape_1_per_frame39=g2 = g*0; b2 = b*0; r2 = r*0;
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=13
shapecode_2_additive=1
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=5
shapecode_2_x=0.650
shapecode_2_y=0.380
shapecode_2_rad=0.57049

shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=0.73678

shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000

shapecode_2_g2=0.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=0.500
shapecode_2_border_g=0.500
shapecode_2_border_b=0.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=k1 = instance/num_inst;
shape_2_per_frame2=x = .5 + .3*sin(instance*k1*413);
shape_2_per_frame3=y = .5 + .3 * sin(instance*k1*113);
shape_2_per_frame4=
shape_2_per_frame5=rad = .1 + .4*sin(k1*333);
shape_2_per_frame6=
shape_2_per_frame7=r =  .5*sin(k1*234);
shape_2_per_frame8=b =  .5*sin(k1*534);
shape_2_per_frame9=g =  .5*sin(k1*34);
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=14
shapecode_3_additive=1
shapecode_3_thickOutline=1
shapecode_3_textured=1
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.600
shapecode_3_y=0.550
shapecode_3_rad=0.97237
shapecode_3_ang=1.25664
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=0.34933
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.600
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=0.000
shapecode_3_b2=1.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=0.200
shapecode_3_border_g=0.700
shapecode_3_border_b=0.500
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.400*( 0.60*sin(0.933*time) + 0.40*sin(1.045*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.100*( 0.60*sin(0.900*time) + 0.40*sin(0.956*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.100*( 0.60*sin(0.910*time) + 0.40*sin(0.920*time) );
per_frame_4=mv_r = wave_r;
per_frame_5=mv_b = wave_b;
per_frame_6=mv_g = wave_g;
per_frame_7=q1 = 0.05*(pow(1+1.2*bass+0.4*bass_att+0.1*treb+0.1*treb_att+0.1*mid+0.1*mid_att,6)/fps);
per_frame_8=//q1 = 0.6*(bass+bass_att);
per_frame_9=mv_a = if(above(bass-1.2,1),1,bass-1.2);
per_pixel_1=zoom = 1.01 + rad*0.15*q1;
warp_1=`float3 Get1 (float2 uvi)
warp_2=`{return (GetPixel(uvi)+GetPixel(uvi+texsize.zw)+GetPixel(uvi-texsize.zw)
warp_3=`+GetPixel(uvi+texsize.zw*float2(1,0)) +GetPixel(uvi+texsize.zw*float2(-1,0)) 
warp_4=`+GetPixel(uvi+texsize.zw*float2(0,1)) +GetPixel(uvi+texsize.zw*float2(0,-1)))/7;}
warp_5=`
warp_6=`
warp_7=`shader_body
warp_8=`{
warp_9=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 0.4 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_10=`float2 udith = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq,uv*8+rand_frame)-0.5;
warp_11=`ret= tex2D( sampler_main, uv + udith*0.00).xyz;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`ret += (ret.xyz - GetBlur1(uv_orig+0.0*bass))*0.35;
warp_14=`ret *= 0.9;
warp_15=`ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.1).r*0.02 * saturate(1-treb_att);
warp_16=`
warp_17=`ret = lerp(ret.xyz, lum(ret.xyz), 0.1)*(0.95-0.05*lum(GetBlur3(uv)));
warp_18=`}
comp_1=`static const int anz = 3;
comp_2=`float3 ret1, neu, blur;
comp_3=`float2 uv3;
comp_4=`shader_body
comp_5=`{
comp_6=`float2 pos = float2 (sin(q10*3.14), cos(q10*3.14+q8*.04));
comp_7=`float r1 = frac(q10/2+time*0.2);
comp_8=`float r2 = frac(q10/4);
comp_9=`float2 uv2;
comp_10=`float ang2, c, s;
comp_11=`uv -= .5;
comp_12=`uv *= aspect.xy;    
comp_13=`ret1 = (roam_sin+0.5)/(0.01+length((uv)*r1-pos*0.07*q7))*0.015*q7;
comp_14=`ret1 += (roam_sin+0.5).bgr/(0.01+length((uv)*r1+pos*0.07*q7))*0.015*q7;
comp_15=`ret1 += (roam_cos+0.5)/(0.02+8*pow(length(uv)-1*r1,2))*0.01*q7;
comp_16=`ret1*= (1+lum(ret1))/2;
comp_17=`float n = 1;
comp_18=`while (n <= anz) {
comp_19=`  ang2 = n/anz*3.1416;
comp_20=`  c = cos(ang2);
comp_21=`  s = sin(ang2);
comp_22=`  uv2.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_23=`  uv2.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_24=`  uv3= abs(frac(uv2*aspect.yx)-.5);
comp_25=`  neu =  max(GetPixel (uv3),GetBlur1(uv3))/2 ;
comp_26=`  ret1 = max(ret1,neu+ret1);
comp_27=`n++;
comp_28=`}
comp_29=`ret = ret1*(1-rad);
comp_30=`
comp_31=`//ret = GetPixel(uv+0.5);
comp_32=`}
